name: Cabochon
description:
Many dangers lurk deep beneath the surface of the earth; be cautious during your relic hunting. 

Seven gems reside on each floor of the dungeon; you have three lives on each to collect them all. 

Good luck.

Features

  • Strategic and difficult arcade game-play
  • 5 different levels with alternate remixed versions
  • A variety of enemies and obstacles
  • A retro 1-Bit art esthetic (except for menu, don't mind that)
  • A whole heck of a lot of screen shake and particles

Credits:

m5x7 font by Daniel Linssen

humble-fonts-free font by somepx

Sounds generated in ChipTone by sfbgames

Cabochon was made for the Godot Wild Jam #32

NOTE

I am unfortunately unable to test the Mac and Linux ports of the game; however, if there are any issues with the game, I will be more than willing to help anyway I can! :)
